Sequence Information.Peptide Name: DASamP1 (D76, Synthetic AMPs, variant of Temporin-PTa, XXA, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: Amino acid substitution, amphibians, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is poorly similar (76.92%) toTemporin-PTa.Activity: active against S. aureus USA300 MRSA (MIC 3.1 uM) and E.coli (MIC > 100 uM) (Menousek et al., 2012). inhibited Human Immunodeficiency Virus Type 1 HIV-1 (EC50 0.63 uM).Toxicity: hemolytic HC50 25 uM. TC50 6.78 uM in CEM-SS cells. Updated 12/2023
Literature Information.Author: Wang G, Watson KM, Peterkofsky A, Buckheit RW Jr. 2010
Literature Information.Title: Identification of novel human immunodeficiency virus type 1-inhibitory peptides based on the antimicrobial peptide database
